summary: Diff implements a new single-page proposal layout (hero + message + proposal moment) and adds a new 2-step proposal component. However, evidence is insufficient that the selected photos were actually added as static assets, and it‚Äôs not fully clear that the experience is consistently attributed to ‚ÄúSuvo‚Äù in on-page copy. Diff also includes/retains extra components (multi-step flow, surprise reveal) and an external promotional footer link that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add exactly two selected uploaded photos as static frontend assets (not backend-served) and reference them by filename; render them responsively with object-fit and descriptive alt text.
missing_requirements.reason: The page references exactly two filenames (IMG_3752.jpeg and IMG_3753.jpeg) and includes alt text, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added to the frontend static assets directory (e.g., frontend/public/assets/...). Without asset additions shown, it‚Äôs not verifiable that the images are stored as static frontend assets as required.
evidence: file-diff summary shows no added image assets under frontend/public or similar

missing_requirements.requirement: All visible text clearly indicates it is from Suvo to Ahana (English), in a simple cute single-page proposal layout.
missing_requirements.reason: The page is clearly addressed to Ahana, but the main page sections shown don‚Äôt explicitly say ‚Äúfrom Suvo‚Äù (the only clear attribution in-page appears to be 'Ahana & Suvo' in the celebration and the document title). The requirement asks that the proposal experience clearly be from Suvo, which is not consistently evident in the visible body copy provided in the diff snippet.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/AhanaProposalPage.tsx (hero headline 'Hey Ahana üíõ' and message section copy; footer lacks explicit 'From Suvo')
frontend/src/components/SimpleProposalMoment.tsx (celebration shows 'Ahana & Suvo' but no explicit sign-off like '‚Äî Suvo')

missing_requirements.requirement: If any celebration animation is used, it must respect prefers-reduced-motion.
missing_requirements.reason: The new proposal moment triggers a confetti effect via <ConfettiBurst />, but the diff snippet does not include ConfettiBurst implementation or any prefers-reduced-motion handling within SimpleProposalMoment itself, so reduced-motion compliance for the celebration effect can‚Äôt be verified from the provided diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Interactive 'SurpriseReveal' envelope section that reveals a hidden personal message when clicked.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-19/20/21; the BuildRequest explicitly calls for minimal sections (hero + short message + photos + proposal moment).

hallucinated_features.description: A separate multi-step proposal flow (4 steps) component (ProposalStepFlow) retained/modified.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-21 requires a single-step or at most two-step interaction; a 4-step flow is not requested and conflicts with the simplification goal (even if it may no longer be used).

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an external promotional link to 'caffeine.ai'.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asks for external links or promotional attribution; this is additional user-facing content not specified.
